name: Infected zone 感染之地
description:
The virus broke out in the city. It came so quickly that most residents have no time to evacuate before the lockdown.

You are one of them. You have to survive among other survivors, parades and zombies and escape before it’s bombed by the government.

It could be a strategy or a shooting game. You could build defense works and deploy manpower.

In spare time, you may also build campsites to keep campfires, sleeping bags, store materials and place survivors. Don’t forget to raise chickens and plant fields to make a living!

Game features:

survival ，In the game, you can pick up a variety of materials, such as building materials, such as bricks, wood, which are used to build obstacles,
camps and so on, which can help to defend the enemy.


Strategy play, you can control your teammates and arrange their positions for defensive operations. All fortifications and manpower deployment in the
game will be designed and built by players


Craft. Besides fighting, the game also contains survival elements. You can farm and raise chickens or trade to obtain survival materials.


Tower defense, in addition to combat by yourself, you can also choose strategic tower defense.
